tags: i think i just broke my own heart thinking about it
summary: I was reading that ask where you said you wish Arthur has a family in season 5 and feel a little like maybe he won’t really have...
question: I was reading that ask where you said you wish Arthur has a family in season 5 and feel a little like maybe he won’t really have a supportive family or a family that’s there very often so that’s why he’s so supportive and positive around his friends. He’s overcompensating for not having a family. Idk I just get the feeling that things aren’t great at home.
answer: oh i can see that happening too, anon. god, that would be heartbreaking. at school, he’d be all sunshine and rainbows and witty quips with the gang but when he goes home, he’s subdued and quiet as he hears his parents arguing yet again before he even goes through the front door.

reblog.comment: oh i can see that happening too, anon. god, that would be heartbreaking. at school, he’d be all sunshine and rainbows and witty quips with the gang but when he goes home, he’s subdued and quiet as he hears his parents arguing yet again before he even goes through the front door.

blog.name: atbest-mediocre
blog.title: i’m mediocre at best🏳️‍🌈
blog.description: things that make me forcefully blow air out my face holes. Quite the myriad of different interests that don’t really fit together. Probably mostly skam and lgbt+ related. Thanks for coming to my Ted Talk.

body:
Skam France Season 5 prediction.

This might be an unpopular opinion so hold your wigs . Arthur has some very deep insecurities and usually takes them out on women, whether it’s treating them poorly (cheating on them, not listening well, being generally lad-ish) or saying he hooked up with an older one to sound cool. Because he is with Alexia, he tries to be more gentlemen-like, but it doesn’t really work and she now becomes the victim of his treatment. She finally tells him that what he is doing is not right and breaks ties with him. All while this is going on, he has a bit of a alcohol/drug problem which is heightened because of the BAC and what Alexia said/did. Because he actually really liked Alexia ( unlike the others) , he falls into a deep pit of drinking and smoking/ drugs . There might be something about him secretly dealing and maybe some trouble while he is in this pit. he can’t understand why he acts like he does because he knows people trust him and people think he is nice and kind, he doesn’t go to school and neither friend group is very happy with him. However, le Gang becomes worried but they can’t get a hold of him. They ask Alexia to go and talk to him. She is reluctant to go, but she does anyway because she was a little worried also. She finds out about the substance abuse, and tells him that everything is going to be fine and to tell le gang or his parents. Le gang takes him to get help and although this makes him feel worse about himself at first, he knows he has support to get better. Everyone knows that he is a good friend and has a kind heart, and wishes he would just be better. When he becomes sober and stable he realizes the life he lived when he was high/drunk all the time was not a good life. He apologizes to alexia for how he treated her and thanks her for helping him confront his problems and then reach out to get help to become sober (he also thanks le gang). There should also be something with his parents in there. I have no clue if this is right, maybe it will be completely not this, I just think they will go for another big societal issue that effects teens which is drugs/ vaping and exposure to alcohol with some “learn how to respect a woman / relationship” mixed in. and perhaps instead of him just telling Alexia about the substance abuse, she finds he has overdosed or has alcohol poisoning in the middle of the day, and that is how everyone finds out. Or something with him ending up in trouble with the police.

summary: "The first time I saw you, it wasnt at the foyer. It was in the hall, the first day I arrived. I didnt know anyone and I walked...
body: “The first time I saw you, it wasnt at the foyer. It was in the hall, the first day I arrived. I didnt know anyone and I walked past you with your friends. You didnt see me. But I saw you. I only saw you, actually.”

blog.name: ao3feed-elu
blog.title: the latest lucas/eliott fics
blog.description:
This is an automatic feed using RSS to post the newest fics from AO3 Lucas/Eliott from Skam France, on your dash.

If not stated otherwise, this is not a rec tumblr. ALT ER LOVE

title: Amour
body:
by ronans

‘Is this your usual service?’ Lucas asks warily as he pulls back the curtain to the changing room. At the lack of immediate response, he peers over his shoulder at Eliott.
Eliott’s got this kind of panicked look on his face, but he quickly schools it and beams, nodding. ‘We like to provide the best customer service possible.’

Words: 1714, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

header: bakkoush

tags: im so excited to find out what the drama will be
summary: Do you have any ideas for what Arthur’s season could be about? I’m trying to think of topics they haven’t covered and domestic...
question: Do you have any ideas for what Arthur’s season could be about? I’m trying to think of topics they haven’t covered and domestic abuse keeps popping into my head and that scares THE SHIT OUT OF ME DONT HURT MY BABIE DAVID
answer:
OH DAMN YEAH I DIDNT EVEN THINK ABOUT THAT?? WOW NO THANK YOU AHAHA

I was literally discussing this with a friend earlier, and god there are just so many possibilities that it’s hard to wrap my head around it?? I mean there are physical and mental disabilities, addiction, learning disabilities, troubles with sexuality, family drama, chronic illness, etc. like even something as #wild as teenage pregnancy could be thrown in, his season is such a wild card??

Somebody was saying how he seems to be the most put together of the entire group, and it would be so interesting if they just made everything in his life a complete mess, which is why he tries so hard to seem like everything is okay. I personally am a big fan of the learning disability route, where he secretly struggles massively with school, and graduating and getting into college becomes a huge concern. Maybe his parents are crazy strict, and he has massive anxiety associated with disappointing them? Maybe he is struggling a bit with sexuality, like being bi or asexual, which is why he makes up stories (like the 34 year old woman) to make himself seem more normal or cool with his friends? I would love to see a storyline focused on family, and about being okay with failure, and maybe not focusing on a specific love interest. God in high school I was just focused on sports and homework and hanging with friends, I didn’t really date anyone at all. But honestly, I’m just spewing shit because we have no idea where they will take this 😂😂😂
